column5: I'm thinking of heading up to NW Ontario in the Fall. I may fly, and am looking for some recommendations for a decent 2 piece muskie rod.  Thanks
I have a Musky 2-pc 9' Rod for sale if you are interested. PM ME or have a look @ my profile to look @ my recent post.
shimano compre or BPS brand  not too many options out there for 2 piece
I have a 2pc 7ft St.Croix that I absolutely love for muskie.  Not as long as my 8ft Compre, but it's a lot easier to throw in the back of the car.
I believe there are 2 St.Croix Premier Muskie series rods in a 2-piece.
